type:
∀ (ε : Rat) (N : Nat),
  GT.gt N.cast (instHDiv.hDiv 1 ε) →
    GT.gt N 0 →
      ∀ (j k : Nat),
        instLENat.le N j →
          instLENat.le N k →
            Rat.instLE.le (instHDiv.hDiv 1 j.cast) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 N.cast) →
              instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.le 0 (instHDiv.hDiv 1 j.cast) →
                Rat.instLE.le (instHDiv.hDiv 1 k.cast) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 N.cast) →
                  instDistribLatticeOfLinearOrder.toSemilatticeInf.le 0 (instHDiv.hDiv 1 k.cast) →
                    And
                      (Rat.instLattice.toSemilatticeInf.le
                        (instHSub.hSub (instHDiv.hDiv 1 j.cast) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 k.cast)) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 N.cast))
                      (Rat.instLattice.toSemilatticeInf.le
                        (SubtractionMonoid.toSubNegZeroMonoid.toNegZeroClass.neg
                          (instHSub.hSub (instHDiv.hDiv 1 j.cast) (instHDiv.hDiv 1 k.cast)))
                        (instHDiv.hDiv 1 N.cast))
name: Chapter5
